changelog.zh: - 新增：多屏每个分屏支持独立悬浮控件（进度条/播放暂停/音量/切换源）`n- 优化：多屏全屏功能对齐单屏，Windows 走原生 API`n- 修复：退出分屏后单屏继承多屏当前源 index，源数量保持不变`n- 修复：多屏源异常时自动尝试下一个源，全部失败才显示错误`n- 修复：返回首页后统一停止并释放播放资源（单屏与多屏）`n- 优化：单屏与多屏切换时互斥释放播放实例，并保留多屏已选频道状态`n- 兼容：移动端行为不受本次桌面多屏改动影响
changelog.en: - New: Per-cell hover controls in multi-screen (progress/play-pause/volume/source switch)`n- Improved: Multi-screen fullscreen now aligns with single-screen and uses native Windows API`n- Fixed: Single-screen now keeps active source index from multi-screen when exiting grid mode, with source count unchanged`n- Fixed: Multi-screen auto-tries next source on source failure and only shows error after all sources fail`n- Fixed: Returning to Home now stops and releases playback resources for both single and multi-screen`n- Improved: Single/multi-screen transitions now release playback instances mutually while preserving selected multi-screen channels`n- Compatibility: Mobile behavior is unaffected by these desktop multi-screen changes
